alfredsnippet.snippet:
mydict = {'a': 'apple', 'b': 'banana','c': 'can'}
keys_lst = list(mydict.keys())
values_lst = list(mydict.values())
myvals = ['apple','can'] # just want to get 'a'

mykeys = [keys_lst[values_lst.index(val)] for val in myvals]

print(mykeys)  #  a and c
alfredsnippet.name: python dictionary keys from values
